about_the_game:
Inventorix, your trusty high-tech space asset inventory device, holds the key to extracting value from the vast resources scattered across the cosmos. But this marvel of technology comes at a price—quite literally. You secured it through a questionable loan scheme, and now you're on the hook to pay off your ever-increasing debt before the space loan sharks come knocking.

Key Features


  • Exploration: Explore, identify and extract value from a diverse array of space resources.
  • Strategic Inventory Management: Pack items within your Inventorix device to discover powerful synergies and maximize your earnings.
  • Alien Allies: Recruit unique, helpful Aliens to boost your earnings.
  • Expansion and Upgrades: Expand your Inventorix device to increase its capacity and potential for greater profits.
  • Resource Diversity: Inventorix processes a wide range of resources, including minerals, plants, mushrooms, space gadgets, and alien eggs.
  • Roguelike Elements: Each journey is unique, with random items and aliens, ensuring a new experience every playthrough.
  • Codex Collection: Complete your Codex by identifying new items and recruiting new Aliens, satisfying the explorer in you.
  • Challenging: Failure to pay off your space loan results in your loss.

Pack items strategically to discover cosmic synergies, recruit unique, helpful Aliens, and expand your Inventorix to boost your gains.
